definition: canon/law/standard work of scholarship/literary quotation or allusion/ceremony/to be in charge of/to mortgage or pawn
surname Li/abbr. for 禮記|礼记[Li3 ji4], Classic of Rites

sentences.english: One of the girls she rescued from a pimp later graduated from high school as valedictorian.
sentences.chinese: 其中一個她所救的女孩之後在高中畢業典禮上致辭。

sentences.english: A major highlight of the ceremony is a unique paper-cut fashion show.
sentences.chinese: 頒獎典禮上一大亮點就是獨特的剪紙時裝秀。

sentences.english: At the awards ceremony, the "Lifetime Achievement Award" went to Fu Zhengyi.
sentences.chinese: 在頒獎典禮上，傅正義獲得“終生成就獎”。

sentences.english: She will give a touching valediction at graduation.
sentences.chinese: 她將在畢業典禮作感人的告別演講。

sentences.english: Today, a grand opening ceremony is held in Nantong Zhanyang Fiber Co.
sentences.chinese: 今天，南通展陽纖維有限公司隆重舉行開業典禮。

sentences.english: This was at the 2001 Academy Awards.
sentences.chinese: 那是在2001年學院獎頒獎典禮上。

sentences.english: The inauguration ceremony for the new Hengqin Port Joint Inspection Complex Building was ceremoniously held on the morning of December 8th.
sentences.chinese: 橫琴口岸新聯檢大樓落成典禮8日上午隆重舉行。

sentences.english: Metallics were huge this year during the Acadvertising campaignemy Awards. Why are metallics so special?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼金屬色在今年頒獎典禮上這麼通行？

sentences.english: He planned to demonstrate the behaviour at the ceremony using puppets.
sentences.chinese: 他計劃在典禮上利用木偶來演示果蝠的這種行爲。

sentences.english: Think Mr. Phipps would let me take time off after endgame ?
sentences.chinese: 你說畢業典禮後菲普斯先生能讓我們去試試嗎？

sentences.english: In addition, a major highlight of the ceremony is a unique paper-cut fashion show.
sentences.chinese: 另外，在頒獎典禮上一大亮點就是獨特的剪紙時裝秀。

sentences.english: Welcome to the official launch by IBM of Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎光臨IBM上海公司的正式開張典禮。

sentences.english: Official Opening of the new school at Toa Payoh.
sentences.chinese: 培羣在大巴窯校址舉行新校舍落成典禮。

sentences.english: Will your family be attending the graduation ceremony?
sentences.chinese: 你的家人要來參加你的卒業典禮嗎？

sentences.english: A Closing Ceremony will be held by Mandarin Class for all students and tutors.
sentences.chinese: 華文班將會在舉辦閉幕典禮給所有學員及教員。

sentences.english: At 3 o'clock in the afternoon, the opening ceremony started.
sentences.chinese: 級新生開學典禮正式開始。

definition: to make a speech/to make some remarks
to take office/to assume a post
